name: props/Array.js
ARRAY
description: The Observable ARRAY Class

params.name: sourceSchema
params.description: The Schema to be used as the shape of the items in the Array

params.name: options.values
params.description: The Array of initial values that will be consumed as Observables according to the Schema

params.name: options.parent
params.description: The Parent Object to which this Array is a member of

params.name: options.name
params.description: The Name/key in the Parent Object to which this Array is assigned

name: push
description: Pushes an item onto the Array

params.name: props
params.description: The Object of values that obeys the item Schema

params.name: preventDefault
params.description: If true then the Change event is not fired

name: shift
description: Removes the first item of the Array and returns that item

unknown.tagValue: {Object} item - The Observalbe Object of the item removed from the array

params.name: preventDefault
params.description: If true then the Change event is not fired

return.description: item - The Observalbe Object of the item removed from the array

name: pop
description: Removes the last item of the Array and returns that item

unknown.tagValue: {Object} item - The Observalbe Object of the item removed from the array

params.name: preventDefault
params.description: If true then the Change event is not fired

return.description: item - The Observalbe Object of the item removed from the array

name: splice
description: Removes a range of items from the Array and returns them

unknown.tagValue: {Object[]} items - The Observalbe Objects of the items removed from the array

params.name: idx
params.description: The index of the first item to be removed

params.name: toremove
params.description: The number of items to be removed

params.name: props
params.description: The array of objects (obeying the Schema) to inserted in the resulting gap

params.name: preventDefault
params.description: If true then the Change event is not fired

return.description: items - The Observalbe Objects of the items removed from the array

name: slice
description: Returns a range of items from the Array

unknown.tagValue: {Object[]} items - The Observalbe Objects of the items selected from the array

params.name: idxFrom
params.description: The index of the first item to be selected

params.name: idxTo
params.description: The index of the last item to be selected

return.description: items - The Observalbe Objects of the items selected from the array

name: remove
description: Removes any matching Items from the Array

unknown.tagValue: {Boolean} success - True if any of the Items were found and removed

params.name: items
params.description: An Array of Observable Objects/Items to be removed

params.name: preventDefault
params.description: If true then the Change event is not fired

return.description: success - True if any of the Items were found and removed

name: filter
description: Returns an Array of the matching items found in the Array according to the provided method

unknown.tagValue: {Boolean} success - True if any of the Items were found and removed

params.name: method
params.description: The predictate method for filtering the items

return.description: success - True if any of the Items were found and removed

name: find
description: Finds a matching item in the Array according to the provided method

params.name: method
params.description: The predictate method for matching the item

name: moveItem
description: Moves an item from one index to another

params.name: indexes.from
params.description: The index of the item to move

params.name: indexes.to
params.description: The index in the Array to move the item to

params.name: preventDefault
params.description: If true then the Change event is not fired

name: indexOf
description: Returns the index of the provided Observable Item

unknown.tagValue: {Integer} index - The index of the found Observable Item

params.name: item
params.description: The Observable Item to return the index of

return.description: index - The index of the found Observable Item

name: map
description: Returns a transposed Array

unknown.tagValue: {Object[]} items - The Array of transposed Items

params.name: method
params.description: The transposing method applied to each item in the Array

return.description: items - The Array of transposed Items

name: forEach
description: Loop through the Array

params.name: method
params.description: The method to be run on each Item

name: reverse
description: Reverses the Array order

unknown.tagValue: {Object[]} items - The new reversed Array of Items

params.name: preventDefault
params.description: If true then the Change event is not fired

return.description: items - The new reversed Array of Items

name: includes
description: Determines if the provided item is in the Array

unknown.tagValue: {Boolean} found - True if the item/value has been found

params.name: value
params.description: The value of an item (according to the Schema) to check for

return.description: found - True if the item/value has been found

name: get
description: Returns the Observable Item by the Index

unknown.tagValue: {Object} item - The item found at the requested index

params.name: idx
params.description: The Index of the item to return (if null, all items are returned)

return.description: item - The item found at the requested index

name: set
description: Sets the internal array of items

unknown.tagValue: {Object[]} items - The new array of Observable Items

params.name: props
params.description: The array of objects to construct the Observable Items (according to the Schema)

params.name: preventDefault
params.description: If true then the Change event is not fired

return.description: items - The new array of Observable Items

name: update
description: Update the items within the Array. If an item has the same prop *_id*, then the item reference is preserved and the props are updated

unknown.tagValue: {Object[]} items - The new array of Observable Items

params.name: props
params.description: The array of objects to construct the Observable Items (according to the Schema)

params.name: preventDefault
params.description: If true then the Change event is not fired

return.description: items - The new array of Observable Items

name: getLength
description: Returns the length of the Array. Used by the virtual property *length*

unknown.tagValue: {Integer} length - The number of items in the Array

return.description: length - The number of items in the Array

name: valueOf
description: Returns an Array of the parsed values of each item

unknown.tagValue: {Object[]} values - Array of primitive item values

return.description: values - Array of primitive item values

name: toJSON
description: Returns the Array of Observable Items

name: toObject
description: Returns the Array of Objects

name: sort
description: Reorders the Array

unknown.tagValue: {Object[]} items - The new array of Observable Items

params.name: sortMethod
params.description: The sort method that determines whether items a and b swap places

params.name: preventDefault
params.description: If true then the Change event is not fired

return.description: items - The new array of Observable Items

content:
import BOOLEAN from './Boolean.js'
import DATE from './Date.js'
import DECIMAL from './Decimal.js'
import INTEGER from './Integer.js'
import STRING from './String.js'
import TEXT from './Text.js'
import REFERENCE from './Reference.js'
/**
 * @ignore
 */
const props = {
  Boolean: BOOLEAN,
  Date: DATE,
  Decimal: DECIMAL,
  Integer: INTEGER,
  String: STRING,
  Text: TEXT
}
/**
 * @ignore
 */
export const typesFoundInSchema = [
  INTEGER,
  BOOLEAN,
  DATE,
  DECIMAL,
  STRING,
  TEXT,
  REFERENCE
]
/**
 * @ignore
 */
export default props

content:
# Observables
A package of observables properties, objects and arrays

##
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "Observables",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Package of Observable parameters",
  "main": "index.js",
  "type": "module",
  "repository": "https://github.com/pauliclark/Observables.git",
  "author": "pauliclark <paul@venuescanner.com>",
  "license": "MIT",
  "private": false,
  "scripts": {
    "test": "NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules node --trace-warnings ./node_modules/.bin/jest",
    "test:file": "NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules node --trace-warnings ./node_modules/.bin/jest \"model\\.test\\.js\"  --watchAll",
    "docs:build": "node --trace-warnings ./node_modules/.bin/esdoc",
    "docs": "node --trace-warnings ./docs.js"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "luxon": "^2.0.2"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.15.0",
    "@babel/preset-react": "^7.14.5",
    "babel-jest": "^27.0.6",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^7.32.0",
    "eslint-config-standard": "^16.0.2",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.22.1",
    "eslint-plugin-node": "^11.1.0",
    "eslint-plugin-promise": "^4.2.1",
    "express": "^4.17.1",
    "jest": "^27.0.6",
    "jsdom": "^17.0.0",
    "react": "^17.0.2",
    "react-dom": "^17.0.2",
    "react-test-renderer": "^17.0.2",
    "regenerator-runtime": "^0.13.9"
  },
  "jest": {
    "testEnvironment": "jsdom",
    "setupFilesAfterEnv": [
      "./tests/setupTests.js"
    ]
  }
}
